cardStrategies.title: Start with a flexible currency
cardStrategies.description: Chase Ultimate Rewards, American Express Membership Rewards, and Capital One Miles give you multiple airline and hotel partners to work with.

cardStrategies.title: Pair premium with no-fee
cardStrategies.description: A premium card unlocks lounge access and travel credits, while a no-fee card keeps points alive when you want to downgrade.

cardStrategies.title: Stack category bonuses
cardStrategies.description: Use dining, grocery, and travel multipliers to earn fasterâ€”then move those points into the program offering the best redemption.

favoriteCombos.name: Everyday Essentials
favoriteCombos.note: A low annual fee starter duo that earns 3x travel/dining and rotating 5x categories while sharing one points pool.

favoriteCombos.name: Premium Globetrotter
favoriteCombos.note: Stack $200 in airline incidental credits with 4x grocery/dining to rack up transferable points quickly.

favoriteCombos.name: Cashback Safety Net
favoriteCombos.note: Earn 2x everywhere, then transfer to Capital One partners or fall back on simple statement credits when award space is scarce.
